name: Unforgettable Brussels, we are starting with the landmarks and ending with the nightlife!
description: Hello everybody,I am fully convinced that you're really excited about your vacation in Belgium. You want to see as much as possible, but you do not have enough time? Do not worry, I have prepared for you a unique day with many positive emotions that you will never forget. I will show you the most interesting and beautiful places in the city which will impress you and which have a magic story. We will start with the amazing landmarks and will eventually finish by visiting the nightlife of Brussels. I'm sure that now you're really interested in my offer and I hope to see you soon!
